00012 //
00013 // FrequencyListCopier
00014 //
00015 // 24 August 2004 -- tds
00016 //
00017 // Finds IndexTerm nodes that only need to return frequency information,
00018 // not positions, and inserts IndexFrequencyTerms instead.
00019 //
00020 
00021 #ifndef INDRI_FREQUENCYLISTCOPIER_HPP
00022 #define INDRI_FREQUENCYLISTCOPIER_HPP
00023 
00024 #include "ListCache.hpp"
00025 namespace indri
00026 {
00027   namespace lang
00028   {
00029     
00030     class FrequencyListCopier : public indri::lang::Copier {
00031     private:
00032       std::vector<indri::lang::Node*> _nodes;
00033       std::stack<indri::lang::Node*> _disqualifiers;
00034       indri::lang::IndexTerm* _lastTerm;
00035       bool _disqualifiedTree;
00036 
00037       ListCache* _listCache;
00038 
00039     public:
00040       FrequencyListCopier( ListCache* listCache ) : _listCache(listCache), _lastTerm(0), _disqualifiedTree(false) {}
00041 
00042       indri::lang::Node* defaultAfter( indri::lang::Node* oldNode, indri::lang::Node* newNode ) {
00043         if( _disqualifiers.size() && oldNode == _disqualifiers.top() )
00044           _disqualifiers.pop();
00045     
00046         _nodes.push_back( newNode );
00047         return newNode;
00048       }
00049 
00050       ~FrequencyListCopier() {
00051         indri::utility::delete_vector_contents<indri::lang::Node*>( _nodes );
00052       }
00053 
00054       void before( indri::lang::ExtentAnd* exAnd ) {
00055         _disqualifiedTree = true;
00056         _disqualifiers.push(exAnd);
00057       }
00058 
00059       void before( indri::lang::ExtentOr* exOr ) {
00060         _disqualifiedTree = true;
00061       }
00062 
00063       void before( indri::lang::ExtentInside* exInside ) {
00064         _disqualifiedTree = true;       
00065       }
00066 
00067       void before( indri::lang::NestedExtentInside* nestExInside ) {
00068         _disqualifiedTree = true;       
00069       }
00070 
00071       void before( indri::lang::ExtentRestriction* exRestrict ) {
00072         _disqualifiedTree = true;       
00073         _disqualifiers.push(exRestrict);
00074       }
00075 
00076       void before( indri::lang::ExtentEnforcement* exEnforce ) {
00077         _disqualifiedTree = true;       
00078         _disqualifiers.push(exEnforce);
00079       }
00080 
00081       void before( indri::lang::FixedPassage* fixedPassage ) {
00082         _disqualifiedTree = true;       
00083         _disqualifiers.push(fixedPassage);
00084       }
00085 
00086       void before( indri::lang::FieldGreaterNode* fieldGreater ) {
00087         _disqualifiedTree = true;
00088         _disqualifiers.push(fieldGreater);
00089       }
00090 
00091       void before( indri::lang::FieldLessNode* fieldLess ) {
00092         _disqualifiedTree = true;       
00093         _disqualifiers.push(fieldLess);
00094       }
00095       
00096       void before( indri::lang::FieldEqualsNode* fieldEquals ) {
00097         _disqualifiedTree = true;
00098         _disqualifiers.push(fieldEquals);
00099       }
00100 
00101       void before( indri::lang::FieldBetweenNode* fieldBetween ) {
00102         _disqualifiedTree = true;
00103         _disqualifiers.push(fieldBetween);
00104       }
00105 
00106       void before( indri::lang::ContextCounterNode* context ) {
00107         if( context->getContext() != NULL ) {
00108           _disqualifiedTree = true;
00109         }
00110       }
00111       
00112       void before( indri::lang::WeightedExtentOr* wExOr ) {
00113         _disqualifiedTree = true;
00114       }
00115 
00116       void before( indri::lang::ODNode* odNode ) {
00117         _disqualifiedTree = true;
00118       }
00119 
00120       void before( indri::lang::UWNode* uwNode ) {
00121         _disqualifiedTree = true;
00122       }
00123 
00124       void before( indri::lang::BAndNode* bandNode ) {
00125         _disqualifiedTree = true;
00126       }
00127 
00128       indri::lang::Node* after( indri::lang::IndexTerm* oldNode, indri::lang::IndexTerm* newNode ) {
00129         _lastTerm = newNode;
00130         return defaultAfter( oldNode, newNode );
00131       }
00132 
00133       void before( indri::lang::RawScorerNode* oldNode, indri::lang::RawScorerNode* newNode ) {
00134         _lastTerm = 0;
00135         _disqualifiedTree = false;
00136       }
00137 
00138 
00139       void before( indri::lang::NestedRawScorerNode* oldNode, indri::lang::NestedRawScorerNode* newNode ) {
00140         before( (indri::lang::RawScorerNode*) oldNode, (indri::lang::RawScorerNode*) newNode );
00141       }
00142 
00143       indri::lang::Node* after( indri::lang::RawScorerNode* oldNode, indri::lang::RawScorerNode* newNode ) {
00144         indri::lang::Node* result = 0;
00145 
00146         if( _lastTerm && !_disqualifiers.size() && !_disqualifiedTree && oldNode->getContext() == NULL ) {
00147           indri::lang::TermFrequencyScorerNode* scorerNode;
00148           // there's a term to score, and nothing to disqualify us from doing frequency scoring
00149           scorerNode = new indri::lang::TermFrequencyScorerNode( _lastTerm->getText(),
00150                                                                  _lastTerm->getStemmed() );
00151 
00152           scorerNode->setNodeName( oldNode->nodeName() );
00153           scorerNode->setSmoothing( oldNode->getSmoothing() );
00154           scorerNode->setStatistics( oldNode->getOccurrences(), oldNode->getContextSize(), oldNode->getDocumentOccurrences(), oldNode->getDocumentCount() );
00155 
00156           delete newNode;
00157           result = defaultAfter( oldNode, scorerNode );
00158         } else if( !_disqualifiers.size() ) {
00159           ListCache::CachedList* list = 0; 
00160 
00161           if( _listCache )
00162             list = _listCache->find( newNode->getRawExtent(), newNode->getContext() );
00163       
00164           if( list ) {
00165             indri::lang::CachedFrequencyScorerNode* cachedNode;
00166             cachedNode = new indri::lang::CachedFrequencyScorerNode( newNode->getRawExtent(), newNode->getContext() );
00167             cachedNode->setNodeName( newNode->nodeName() );
00168             cachedNode->setSmoothing( newNode->getSmoothing() );
00169             cachedNode->setList( list );
00170 
00171             delete newNode;
00172             result = defaultAfter( oldNode, cachedNode );
00173           } else {
00174             result = defaultAfter( oldNode, newNode );
00175           }
00176         } else {
00177           result = defaultAfter( oldNode, newNode );
00178         }
00179 
00180         _disqualifiedTree = false;
00181         return result; 
00182       }
00183 
00184       indri::lang::Node* after( indri::lang::NestedRawScorerNode* oldNode, indri::lang::NestedRawScorerNode* newNode ) {
00185         return after( (indri::lang::RawScorerNode*) oldNode, (indri::lang::RawScorerNode*) newNode );
00186       }
00187     };
00188   }
00189 }
00190 
00191 #endif // INDRI_FREQUENCYLISTCOPIER_HPP
